 2009-18902009-11-26NRCAN,  IA&ND,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Oil and Gas Operations Act
SubjectCanada Oil and Gas Drilling and Production Regulations
PrecisCANADA OIL AND GAS DRILLING AND PRODUCTION REGULATIONS in order to amalgamate and modernize the existing Drilling Regulations and the Production and Conservation Regulations that currently exist, in mirror form, under the Canada Oil and Gas Operations Act and the Accord Acts. The new regulations address the high level of duplication between the existing regulations and increasing requests to use new or cost effective technologies and processes not reflected in the current regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0315 Publication Date: 2009-12-09
